title: "Vancouver, Canada Chapter - SCGIS"

Welcome to the homepage for the newly formed Vancouver, BC Canada Chapter of the Society for Conservation GIS.

We aim to bring together the regional community of conservation related Geographic Information System (GIS) individuals across Vancouver and the greater province of British Columbia.

Our chapter is an affiliated chapter of the Society for Conservation GIS (SCGIS). The SCGIS helps bring together conservation practioners and GIS technology by supporting communication and networking, scholarships, and training across the world. Membership is open to anyone looking to engage in a GIS conservation related community.

## Join the list

```{=html}
<style>
  .signup { max-width: 420px; padding: 1rem; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 10px; }
  .signup label { display:block; margin-top:.6rem; font-weight:600; }
  .signup input { width:100%; padding:.5rem; margin-top:.25rem; border:1px solid #ccc; border-radius:8px; }
  .signup button { margin-top:1rem; padding:.6rem 1rem; border:0; border-radius:8px; cursor:pointer; }
  #signup-msg { margin-top:.6rem; font-size:.95rem; }
</style>

<div class="signup">
  <form id="signup-form">
    <label for="email">Email</label>
    <input id="email" name="email" type="email" required autocomplete="email" />

    <label for="firstName">First name</label>
    <input id="firstName" name="firstName" type="text" required autocomplete="given-name" />

    <label for="lastName">Last name</label>
    <input id="lastName" name="lastName" type="text" required autocomplete="family-name" />

    <button type="submit">Sign up</button>
  </form>
  <div id="signup-msg" aria-live="polite"></div>
</div>

<script>
  // 1) Put your Apps Script "web app" URL here (must be the /exec URL)
  const WEB_APP_URL = "https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbx5kxPp8jpES267SUobXkIzPxCJjs5CBdfHplOctDeeIPk8-QZDeCP_jVbjEoS1gteg/exec";

  const form = document.getElementById("signup-form");
  const msg  = document.getElementById("signup-msg");

  form.addEventListener("submit", async (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    msg.textContent = "Submitting…";

    // Collect fields; names must match what your Apps Script expects
    const payload = {
      email:     document.getElementById("email").value.trim(),
      firstName: document.getElementById("firstName").value.trim(),
      lastName:  document.getElementById("lastName").value.trim()
    };

    try {
      // Using no-cors avoids CORS issues with Apps Script; we can't read the response, but the row will be added.
      await fetch(WEB_APP_URL, {
        method: "POST",
        mode: "no-cors",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify(payload)
      });

      form.reset();
      msg.textContent = "Thanks! You're on the list.";
    } catch (err) {
      console.error(err);
      msg.textContent = "Sorry—something went wrong. Please try again.";
    }
  });
</script>
